abstract: Carl C. Icahn, the billionaire investor known for shaking up companies, is sounding as feisty as ever as he seeks to quash a lawsuit that a hedge fund has filed against him.
snippet: Carl C. Icahn, the billionaire investor known for shaking up companies, is sounding as feisty as ever as he seeks to quash a lawsuit that a hedge fund has filed against him.
lead_paragraph: Carl Icahn’s blog has been quiet lately, but the billionaire investor is sounding pretty feisty as he seeks to quash a lawsuit that a hedge fund has filed against him.

headline.main: The XO Files: R2 vs. Icahn
